However, Andrew and Qidi's feedback about the tiling leaves Martin and Petra planning to hit back on payment day

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the last time to find out what they've been paid and settle some scores. Mark from the Bowling Green Hotel questions Martin and Petra about a lack of chairs and then gives Qidi and Andrew's noisy fridge comments a frosty reception

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who were searching for their first homes. In 2018 in Kettering, Claudia and Tom wanted room for their work as illustrators and for their crafting hobbies, as well as the room to start a family. Meanwhile in Leicester, Mike and Karen needed help finding a home to bring them together

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer meet Gary and Bill in the Edinburgh suburb of Portobello, who are unsure whether to sell their 19th-century four-bed home or renovate instead. Bill loves their home's character, quirkiness and close proximity to the seaside, but Gary hates the busy road and the home's layout, and would like to settle down somewhere new

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Dick Strawbridge follows the fortunes of Brit Mandy and her American business partner Steve, who have decided to build a swimming pool to entice more paying guests to their stunning cliff-edge chateau in the Dordogne. Desperate to increase income at his chateau, Michael invites Angel Adoree to help out with an experiment to do afternoon tea for the locals

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets energy conservationist Andrew, who has decided to build a radical, self-heating home for his family - the first of its kind in the UK. He aims to heat the house all year round by storing the warmth of the summer sun into insulated earth banks over and around the house, and then drawing the warmth back into the living spaces in winter. However, this pioneering construction seems an exercise in trial and error from the start, and what began as a seemingly simple, pure concept becomes a complicated feat of engineering

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: This documentary follows the arrest of a man on suspicion of conspiracy to murder. While driving to work, the victim was hit from behind by another vehicle, and while inspecting the damage was shot in the leg at close range by someone wielding a sawn-off shotgun. Detectives believe the case arises from a potential love triangle that has spiralled out of control - and have just 24 hours to gather sufficient evidence to bring charges, or release the suspect

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Ashleigh is rushed to St George's by ambulance after twisting her leg while playing football. X-rays reveal that her femur is broken and she will need surgery. Meanwhile, three-year-old Lola visits A&E with her dad after having a seizure, and 91-year-old Betty arrives with severe chest pain. Doctors carry out a blood test in order to find out whether she is having a heart attack and will require life-saving surgery

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics Jan Vann and Chelsie Kennedy rush to a road traffic collision, but find the driver of the car has left the vehicle and doesn't want to be treated by the crew. The police suspect he may have been drinking, but the crew need to convince him to receive their help. In Coventry, paramedics Neil and Laura rush to a two-year-old boy who is having a severe allergic reaction

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Cameras capture the work of some of Britain's busiest air ambulance teams as they race to save lives. The helicopter medics cut short an appearance at a charity event in Suffolk to treat a dirtbiker who's crashed at speed. Sammy has a cardiac arrest while working at a windfarm, and Stephen breaks his thigh while off-road motorbiking in the Pennines

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy words and numbers quiz, with Sean Lock and Danny Dyer taking on Joe Wilkinson and Gabby Logan, while David O'Doherty joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Ashleigh is rushed to St George's by ambulance after twisting her leg while playing football. X-rays reveal that her femur is broken and she will need surgery. Meanwhile, three-year-old Lola visits A&E with her dad after having a seizure, and 91-year-old Betty arrives with severe chest pain. Doctors carry out a blood test in order to find out whether she is having a heart attack and will require life-saving surgery

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Chef Tony Singh and presenter Sophie Morgan compete to make the best holiday snow globes, and TV personality Mark-Francis Vandelli goes head to head with queen of clean Aggie MacKenzie to make intricate jelly art

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Johnny Amobi has fallen in love with the island of Gran Canaria so much that he has now decided to relocate there permanently with his 14-year-old son. With the support of his best friend Deniece, he is helped by Laura Hamilton who delivers five of the very best homes on the island for them to choose between

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A Manchester couple's plans to take over a Costa Blanca bar are in jeopardy, a Spanish adventure golf course is given a trial run and things do not measure up at a French gîte

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel Britain to find items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. Simon recycles some historic oak, while Henry comes unstuck when he tries to get to grips with an old Ford Escort

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole gives Simon O'Brien a motorcycling masterclass in Wiltshire as the duo seek more items to fix up and sell on to make profits for their owners

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The death of Constance Harrington from Worthing, West Sussex, sheds light on a notorious 20th-century scandal, and investigators in the case of David Granger, who died in 2010, uncover a family mystery involving two brothers separated from their other relatives. Plus, details of unclaimed estates where heirs need to be found

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at Grange Farm Park in Maltby le Marsh, Lincolnshire, which is run by mum and daughter team Ann Graves and Rebecca O'Brien. Guests Emily and Warren marvel at their luxury room, while father and son Bis and Deep can't wait to dive into their hot tub. But Marilyn and Neil are concerned that their bathroom might be a bit cramped. After a day out feeding baby seals at a local seal sanctuary, the B&Bers congregate at the on-site restaurant for dinner, where Marilyn isn't pleased to find out that she and Neil are the only guests without a hot tub

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Marilyn and Neil Tuson host the second night of the week at Edgecliff Boutique B&B in Birchington-on-Sea, Kent - hoping the breathtaking views will give them the edge they need. Guests Emily and Warren are big fans of their room's sea views, but Bis and Deep find a dirty kettle and Ann and Rebecca aren't happy about a dusty chandelier. Later, in the morning, there's a long wait at breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at Vera's Kitchen and B&B in Lechlade, Gloucestershire, where young owners Warren Neinaber and Emily Mapson hope to impress their guests

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests check in to the Preston Hotel in Yeovil, owned by father and son Bis and Deep Oozageer. Ann and Rebecca find their room more cheap than cheerful, although an afternoon tasting the produce at a cider brandy distillery proves a massive hit

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners reunite, ready to air their grievances from throughout the week. Ann and Rebecca from Grange Farm Park aren't happy with Marilyn marking them down for the lack of a hot tub, and Marilyn herself isn't too pleased when her and Neil review the feedback for their slow breakfast service at Edgecliff Boutique B&B

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two couples who were at very different stages in their lives. In 2016, Kirstie Allsopp searched around Warrington for childhood sweethearts Andy and Jen, who were ready to start a family. Back in 2017, Phil helped Kent converts Rich and Debs find a new home with a sea view. Now, Phil returns to find out if both couples are happy in their new homes

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp catches up with Julie and Allen in Stoke, a couple who appeared on the show in 2019, to see if they followed through with their decision. Julie and Allen could not agree on any of the many houses they had viewed together, so they turned to Kirstie and Phil to help end their decade-long debate - should they sell their home or stay put and renovate?

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: As Jonathan and Michael prepare their chateau for the big wedding, they have a sewage problem that threatens to take the whole first floor out of action; with 40 guests due, the timing couldn't be worse. Mandy and Steve's pool problems continue, and, with the first guests of the season about to arrive, they also have to contend with a collapsed wall. It's decision time for Philip and Angelina - can they find their own chateau to buy or is it time to return to Britain?

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud visits a couple planning to build a home that looks like a work of art overlooking a valley in south Devon. Joe and Claire's new home will be a giant sculpture inspired by the local landscape, 70 metres long and featuring 34 enormous angled zinc shards jutting out in all directions. It will also be complicated to build and equally as expensive. And although Joe is wealthy, ambitious and fearless, his team quickly come up against problems and the budget virtually doubles the first walls go up. Is his dream home in danger of become a nightmare?

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Barrie, 78, is rushed in with breathing difficulties and tests reveal he has fluid on his lungs and faces serious medical treatment, while 75-year-old David is treated after falling down a flight of stairs, and 82-year-old Bob is admitted after a DIY accident at home

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency?
programme.desc: Wiltshire's emergency services deal with people who live alone, including an elderly woman who has suffered a fall but is clearly longing for a chat. Police are also called out to a residential estate in Swindon where neighbours have reported consistent antisocial behaviour from Tracey, an aggressive and combustible woman who lives alone. She is brought in on a drunk and disorderly charge, but once in custody the officers see another side to her personality

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors carry out tests on 77-year-old Martin, who was rushed to St George's after collapsing at home and suffered two further seizures in A&E. As he waits to find out what is causing him problems, his wife Margaret talks about their life together. Meanwhile, 83-year-old widower Harry arrives with shortness of breath, chest pains and dizziness after collapsing while shopping. Paediatric nurse Kelly, who loves working with children, treats six-year-old Lilly, who has cut her head after falling off her scooter

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: In Birmingham, paramedics Adi Ahmed and Mark McDonagh rush to a 10-year-old boy who has had a major epileptic fit. At the same time in Coventry, an elderly woman with heart and lung failure is struggling to breathe but refuses to go to hospital for treatment. Plus, in Warwick, a crew is called to an elderly man who has extreme anxiety and has called emergency services 14 times

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy words-and-numbers quiz, with David Mitchell and Cariad Lloyd taking on Jon Richardson and Russell Howard. Sam Simmons joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Barrie, 78, is rushed in with breathing difficulties and tests reveal he has fluid on his lungs and faces serious medical treatment, while 75-year-old David is treated after falling down a flight of stairs, and 82-year-old Bob is admitted after a DIY accident at home

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty finds out about a threat to British juniper berries that could spell the end of gin's recent resurgence, while Kate Quilton heads to Hawaii to find out why macadamia nuts are not sold in their shells. Matt Tebbutt investigates the possible health risks caused by his habit of going back for a second dip in a communal salsa with a tortilla chip that's already been in his mouth

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: TV presenter Anneka Rice and pop star Cheryl Baker go head to head as they each create a pair of leather earrings in the timed challenge, and TV personality Jo Wood takes on broadcaster Natasha Kaplinsky in a pyrography craft-off

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Recently married house hunters Lildonia and Cory from London cannot wait to start a family, and for them there is no better place than a return to their Caribbean roots in Barbados. Will any of the five properties that Danni Menzies has lined up for their £250,000 budget fit the bill?

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: Holiday cottage owners in France learn the perils of having pet-friendly accommodation, while a property developer is on course for success with his brand-new adventure golf business in Alicante

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit the Cotswolds and Somerset, where finds include a set of milk churns and an old munitions shell

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien find, fix and flog a huge range of possessions they unearth in Britain's barns and garages, to make money for their owners. In this episode, they celebrate Henry's birthday with some serious finds in Wensleydale in Yorkshire

programme.title: Heir Hunters
programme.desc: The probate detectives investigate the case of Margaret Snare, who died in 2010 aged 85, but discover her family history does not add up. Plus, they help a relative of Dorothy Warcup claim her inheritance

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition begins at the Castle Arms Inn in Snape, North Yorkshire, where owner Jill Chinnery hopes the charms of her 17th-century coaching inn will give her the edge

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&Bers enjoy the great outdoors at Eden Valley Glamping in Cumbria, a site with a back-to-basics approach - but a dusty bathroom and damp duvets put a crimp in the guests' stay

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at Fernie Castle in Letham, Fife, where owners Neil and Mary Blackburn hope to impress their guests with their traditional 15th century B&B

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests check in to the Cadillac Kustomz Hotel on the Isle of Bute, where the retro design proves popular but the Scottish-American breakfast seems to get lost in translation

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet up for a final showdown, as Jill from the Castle Arms Inn takes issue with her feedback - wanting to quiz Neil and Mary on their curtain comments in particular. Next, Liz and Dave hope the others will eat their words over the breakfast complaints they found hard to swallow at their Eden Valley Glamping site in Cumbria

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two sets of househunters whose searches were all about family. Retired couple Tom and Sue are living in their motorhome having sold their beloved cottage in Tom's native Yorkshire. The plan is to move 150 miles south to be near Sue's grandson - and they long for an open-plan home with a huge garden. Meanwhile, doting father Charlie, who is recently divorced, and his two children would like a new family home in Kent to start a new chapter in their lives

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: Phil Spencer returns to Cullercoats on North Tyneside to catch up with Mark and Suze, who were unable to agree on what to do with their four-bed Victorian town house. When Kirstie and Phil first met the couple nine months earlier, emotional ties to their home had left them in limbo, with Suzie feeling like she was unable to leave, but Mark longed to move into a bigger home with a better layout for their family. Now, Phil returns to find out if they followed through with their decision

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau: DIY
programme.desc: Jonathan and Michael prepare for a wedding day with 45 guests. With the first guests of the season about to turn up, the pool continues to be a problematic nightmare for Mandy and Steve. Dick's wife Angel shows some clever, cheap, wedding tips - but will Dick and the kids like them?

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud meets Andy Stakes and Jeanette Hardy, who are building a new house on top of a sheer cliff on the west coast of Scotland. The pair want to spend £250,000 on a two-bedroom, glass-fronted and earth-sheltered home for themselves and their two beloved Newfoundland dogs. However, construction on such an exposed site is fraught with danger and the pair face no end of problems throughout the build, and a last minute design change that begs the biggest question: even if Andy finishes the house, will Jeanette actually like it?

programme.title: The Wall: Cover Your Tracks
programme.desc: Celine sees the pattern behind the murders - the victim, the executioner and the person who oversees it all. Her terrifying conclusion leads to another - that her daughter is in danger. Canadian mystery drama, starring Isabel Richer and Alexandre Landry. In French

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Thirty-seven-year-old Robert arrives at St George's Hospital, London after colliding with a car on his motorbike. Scans show he has a bleed on the brain, a broken jaw, and two missing teeth, and he faces potentially life-changing injuries and extensive surgery. Meanwhile, 54-year-old Mary collapsed in the street on the way to work and hit her head. Doctors need to establish whether it is simple fainting, or whether something more sinister is to blame, with tests revealing she will need a pacemaker fitted. Plus, 27-year-old Jessica comes to A&E with a wound that will not heal, after having a lumpectomy to remove breast cancer tissue two months ago

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Fifty-nine-year-old Charulata is rushed to A&E after collapsing at home with signs of a stroke. She has a history of strokes, diabetes, and is awaiting a heart bypass, so doctors send her for a CT scan to find out what has happened. Twenty-eight-year-old carpenter Luke - who has epilepsy - arrives after cutting his finger at work. Although his girlfriend Stacy says it looks like a paper cut, he is worried it may trigger a seizure. Meanwhile, 75-year-old Anne comes to St George's after falling and hurting her arm on holiday

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line

programme.desc: Reluctant tourist Richard Ayoade is joined by comedian Matt Lucas for a frenetic 48 hours in the Italian capital. Their first challenge is finding suitable headgear to protect from the scorching Italian sun. They then take a guided tour in vintage Fiat 500 cars, and after wending their way past the Circus Maximus finish atop Gianicolo Hill in time for the cannon being fired - a daily ritual since the 1850s. Next they head to the border of the Vatican, before experiencing the very best of modern Italian cuisine. Day two sees visits to the Trevi Fountain and the Colosseum, perhaps Rome's most incredible antiquity

programme.desc: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series. Police in New South Wales have their eye on three cannabis growers, and Western Australia officers use canine assistance to nail a drug-addled criminal.

programme.title: The Force: Behind the Line

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May take a look at increasingly popular tall hatchbacks known as crossovers. Having concluded their primary appeal is to caravanners, the duo spend a couple of days in models by Mazda and Volkswagen and try to get a feel for what life is like for the people they believe would buy one. Meanwhile, Richard Hammond drives a pair of exciting Lamborghinis in Italy - the ferocious Aventador Roadster and the limited-edition Sesto Elemento, which carries an eye-watering price tag of around £2million. Two cars are also put through their paces on the test track, with James in a modern re-creation of the classic Porsche 911 and Aerosmith frontman Steven Tyler in the rather less exotic Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson drives the Jaguar F-Type sports car on some of Britain's finest roads, while Richard Hammond jumps inside the Range Rover Sport and gives it a thorough workout off-road, on a track and in what he believes is its most natural habitat - the lanes of Cheshire. James May goes for a countryside adventure in the New Routemaster London bus brought into use in 2013, which is propelled by a turbodiesel generator and a powerful electric motor. Inspired by the machines they have tested, the trio then meet to celebrate Britain's motor industry with a grand finale in front of Buckingham Palace. Plus, former Formula One driver Mark Webber takes to the track for a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Australian Ninja Warrior

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.desc: Richard Ayoade and comedian Joe Lycett head to the mini break mecca of Amsterdam. Their two-day hurtle through the city's attractions takes in culture, canals, cuisine, and other things not necessarily beginning with C. As part of their whistle-stop tour, the duo doss down in one of the city's hippest hotels, take a battery-powered boat tour, do some drawing, and peer into the world of the water bear. The brave travellers also sample some Dutch gin known as jenever, and visit the city's street organ museum

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India
programme.desc: Joanna meets the Maharaja of Dungarpur who shows her around his lakeside palace, and a Dalit community in Gujarat, considered to be India's lowest caste. Braving the roads of Mumbai, Joanna takes a ride in the city's only all-female taxi company and visits the Times of India, where her uncle was editor of the paper in the 1930s and 40s. She then overcomes her fear of heights to explore the World One Tower, soon to be Mumbai's tallest luxury residential building

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the penultimate leg of his journey Michael Portillo travels from Lynton to Exeter. He gets up close to a piece of natural history, visits a garden used as a viewing platform for public hangings and examines a timepiece like no other

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues to follow the route of the Great Eastern Line, enjoying a ride on a miniature railway hidden beneath London. During his trip, he also rings the bells of Bow Church, and tries his hand at announcing at Fenchurch Street station

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo retraces railway journeys made by Queen Victoria in the south of England, where she would travel from Windsor Castle in Berkshire to her summer retreat on the Isle of Wight. The first leg of the trip takes him from Windsor's railway station to Didcot in Oxfordshire, stopping along the way to view a structure designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel in Maidenhead. He also tries to collect the mail in the manner of Victorian postal workers on a steam-powered travelling post office

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's India
programme.desc: Joanna's adventures across India conclude as she explores Rajasthan, Delhi and the mountainous North West, before ending in Kashmir, the place of her birth. Her first stop takes her to the Ranthambhore National Park, where she learns about the Wildlife Protection Society of India's tiger conservation programmes. Joanna's next stop takes her to the city of Delhi, where she begins her exploration of the capital at Humayun's Tomb, before ending her 5000 mile journey in Srinagar in Kashmi, the place where she was born

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Trans-Siberian Adventure
programme.desc: The actress embarks on her third travelogue, having previously traced the Nile from its source and sampled the varied rural, historical and urban cultures of Greece. This time, she sets out to travel 6,400 miles making use of the Trans-Siberian Railway, which is considered the longest railway line in the world. Joanna's journey begins in Hong Kong, where she spent some of her childhood. She takes a bullet train to Beijing, where she meets a woman who claims to have known the last Chinese emperor's favourite concubine, and officially joins the Trans-Siberian track. From there, she travels to the Great Wall, and takes an overnight train into Mongolia via the Gobi desert

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Vegetarian Hannah Wilson prepares an Italian feast for her guests in Dundee, and in a bid to win over her carnivore guests she devises a cunning plan that involves dishing up some meat with the starter

When the body of a marine is found strung up at a construction site, the agents travel to LA to work with another NCIS team on an investigation into an international arms deal that escalates into a high-priority case, and Tony begins to pry into Ziva's life. Guest starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J (NCIS: Los Angeles)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Agent Callen poses as an arms trade contact in a bid to catch killer Michael Aaron Rivkin. Meanwhile, Tony fears Ziva may not be loyal to the team, and a psychologist uncovers the truth about the relationship between Gibbs and Agent Macy. With Chris O'Donnell, Louise Lombard and LL Cool J

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is forced to work alongside the FBI to catch the killer of an Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent who was murdered during a poker game at the Secretary of the Navy's mansion. Elsewhere, Tony takes on Rivkin in a confrontation that ends in one of them being shot

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body in the East River leads Briscoe and Green to investigate the drug-addicted brother of a famous footballer - and as the case unfolds, it becomes clear she may not have been the killer's only victim. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A tennis star is attacked in her locker room before a big tournament, and her wrist is broken during the incident. The sportswoman cannot give a description of her assailant, but the circumstances of the fray lead the detectives to suspect one of her competitors. Chris Noth stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green think they have got their man when the prime suspect in a murder investigation knows every detail about the killing. However, when he claims he acquired his information from a psychic vision, the detectives have their work cut out. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The shooting of a board-member at an exclusive private school, and a man's ambitions for his offspring are stretched to the limit when he admits to the crime, despite the fact his son was the gunman. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An unfinished building is demolished when a bomb is detonated on-site, killing a 12-year-old boy. Logan and Briscoe call on the construction company, and their suspicions fall on a bankrupt contractor and a jealous husband. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Logan and Briscoe deal with a double homicide when an abused alcoholic breaks into his parents' former home and murders the current occupants. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony and Ziva visit Paris to escort Nora Williams, the key witness in an embezzlement case, back to America - but on the return flight they realise an assassin has boarded the plane with them, determined to ensure she never reaches home soil to testify. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony and Ziva track a suspected terrorist to a warehouse, where they find traces of radioactive metal - together with evidence suggesting a nuclear attack is being planned on Washington, DC. Unfortunately, news of the threat leaks out to the public, triggering widespread panic. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Iraq war veteran Damon Werth asks Gibbs and the team to investigate the death of another former marine, who was murdered while working as a lorry driver, so Ziva hits the road to catch the killer. Joe Spano and Paul Telfer guest star

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU tries to stop the killing spree of a couple who met through Alcoholics Anonymous. The pair ignored the crucial 13th step of resisting intimate relationships with recovering patients and set out on a drunken massacre. Guest starring Adrianne Palicki and Jonathan Tucker

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team sets out to find a murderous taxi driver with an acute sense of smell who targets women with a strong natural scent, dumping their bodies with a square of skin removed from their feet. Meanwhile, Prentiss becomes the victim of unwanted attention when someone leaves a strange box on her doorstep

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the violent outbursts of two police officers leads Stabler and Benson to believe an anti-malaria drug issued by the armed forces is responsible for their behaviour. Starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler investigates an attack on a teenage girl, posing as a paroled sex offender to gain access to the halfway house and therapy group attended by the chief suspect. Unfortunately, Cragen soon begins to fear he is getting too involved in the case. Crime drama, guest starring Robert Patrick, with Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: After a disgraced hostage negotiator impersonates Eric, the rest of the team must save his reputation and rescue a kidnapped hotel owner

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: When a baby is abducted from his cot by a notorious serial kidnapper, the team must find out why the child was targeted and locate him before he is taken out of the country

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Environmental activists rocket to the top of the most-wanted list when the task force discovers the group is trying to gain possession of a highly destructive weapon. Cooper sends Liz and Ressler to thwart the eco-terrorists' political stunt, which in turn gives Liz the chance to escape an overbearing acquaintance. Meanwhile, master manipulator Red tricks a loved one to get what he wants

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team flies to Israel, but receives a hostile reception from Ziva's father, who is the head of intelligence agency Mossad. As events unfold, Gibbs learns that Ziva was romantically involved with Rivkin and finds himself forced to make a tough decision. Guest starring Michael Nouri, alongside Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony travels to North Africa on the trail of missing agent Ziva, who is thought to have been tracking down a terrorist leader called Saleem Ulman. Intent on exacting revenge for her apparent death during a flight to Somalia, he is taken hostage by militants and discovers she is still alive - only to be given a potentially catastrophic ultimatum. Starring Mark Harmon and Cote de Pablo

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his team investigate the bizarre deaths of a marine and two of his friends at a stag party. Elsewhere, Gibbs tries to persuade Vance to allow Ziva back into the NCIS. However, she must first pass a barrage of psychological evaluations. Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a woman dies in a hospital emergency room, Briscoe and Logan investigate a doctor's unorthodox method of treating cancer, which McCoy intends to prove is negligent homicide. Sam Waterston joins the cast

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman lies in a coma after being found with a bullet in her head, leaving Briscoe and Logan to investigate whether her abusive husband is responsible for shooting her. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A Japanese nightclub owner is killed while visiting New York, and a singer who once worked for the victim is arrested on suspicion of murder. While working on the case, Olivet is forced to confront memories of her sexual assault. Guest starring Laura Linney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An old acquaintance of Logan's is found dead, and is presumed to have committed suidice until the investigation reveals he was recently in contact with a former priest accused of sex crimes

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A taxi-driver is found dead in his car, and Logan follows a chain of evidence involving a loan shark, a forged cheque and a missing plumber that leads him to believe the victim's wife is the killer. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Logan and Briscoe investigate the murder of a psychiatrist, and their inquiries lead them to suspect the killer is either the victim's former husband, her obstructive father or a patient with multiple personality disorder

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a Navy captain is killed in a robbery that went badly wrong, Gibbs' former mother-in-law surfaces as a witness in the investigation, and it transpires the victim had ties to a drug cartel that murdered the agent's first wife Shannon and daughter Kelly. Guest starring Gena Rowlands

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine is found with a gunshot wound six years after disappearing in Afghanistan, and the team discovers he vanished while carrying out an undercover operation. Gibbs suspects the wife could be hiding valuable information, but when a second woman challenges the soldier's identity and he subsequently dies in hospital, the team uncovers what really happened on that fateful mission

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents reluctantly team up with the coast guard to investigate the apparent murder of a Navy diver who was trying to recover a sunken ship and its treasure, and Gibbs finds a prime suspect in a wealthy doctor who had bankrolled the underwater mission. Starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny is caught up in a chase involving a gunman while driving his family home. Despite being off-duty, he draws his gun in an attempt to apprehend the attacker - but puts Linda and their sons in danger as a result. Meanwhile, Frank begins sessions with a psychiatrist after discovering one of the people he worked alongside at Ground Zero is about to die. Guest starring F Murray Abraham (Amadeus)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of an alleged rapist is brought to an abrupt halt by the death of his accuser, who claimed he had made her pregnant - and subsequent developments suggest the accusations may have been false. Detective drama, starring Mariska Hargitay, Christopher Meloni and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson receives an alarming call from a girl who seems to have been abducted. Establishing the child's name and gaining some background information provides a starting point, but her captor's ability with electronics makes convincing the agent's colleagues extremely difficult. Mariska Hargitay stars

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: Eric gets mixed up in an assassination attempt when he attends an event at the US embassy in Bogota - and his girlfriend is accused of being involved

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: A woman loses her memory after surviving a bombing, so the Crisis Resolution team must uncover who she is - and if she is a victim or the perpetrator

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: The hunters become the hunted when the discovery of a mutilated corpse leads Liz to investigate the bloody underworld of animal poaching. As Red provides a lead on who could be behind the murder, Ressler develops an unhealthy habit. Drama, starring James Spader

programme.title: The Blacklist
programme.desc: Keen and Ressler attempt to track down a hitman known as the Scimitar, who has been dispatched to exact revenge for the assassination of an Iranian scientist. Liz also continues to try to uncover information on Berlin, while Red becomes friends with a woman working at a food truck. Megan Boone and James Spader star

Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a marine off the coast of Tanzania - a case complicated by the discovery that he had a link to Ziva. The mystery deepens even further with the recovery of wreckage from a sunken freighter. Starring Mark Harmon, Cote de Pablo, David McCallum, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the Halloween murder of a marine with a fondness for playing practical jokes. As the evidence accumulates, they begin to suspect he was killed by the exasperated victim of one of his pranks. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Assistant DAs McCoy and Kincaid put their careers on the line in search of the truth behind the death of a wealthy woman. Meanwhile, detectives question the victim's first and second husbands, and her teenage daughter

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A routine investigation brings to light evidence that prompts Briscoe and Logan to pick up the trail of a political fugitive who went underground following a 1971 burglary that left a police officer dead. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Lt Van Buren is mugged by two teenagers, but the hold-up does not go according to plan and the officer discharges her weapon, killing one of the youngsters with a shot to the back. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A gay city councillor is shot dead after a meeting, and the trail of suspicion leads the team to a bigoted rival politician and a male prostitute. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and his new partner Ray Curtis investigate the murder of a girl who disappeared after school, and the trail of clues begins with blurry footage of her capture recorded by an ATM machine's camera. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Tensions are high between new partners Briscoe and Curtis as they investigate the murder of a wealthy student in a biker bar. The detectives discover the victim's father had offered him $10,000 to drop his hobby and his biker girlfriend. Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A reporter for the Navy Times is found stabbed to death - and the team learns he had been going to meet a call girl linked to three other murders. Gibbs decides to ask former madam Holly Snow for help in tracking her down. Crime drama, guest starring Dina Meyer (Saw), with Mark Harmon and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An NCIS polygraph specialist comes under suspicion when a murder occurs while he is moonlighting, and the agents step in to determine whether their colleague is responsible. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A navy lieutenant's car careers off the road and he is found to have been murdered behind the wheel. NCIS is called in to investigate and Tony becomes obsessed with finding the victim's sister, a well-known TV reporter whose disappearance is seemingly linked to the case - and several others. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherly and Mark Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a mutilated body is found in a car at a scrapyard, the NCIS agents find themselves trying to locate a serial killer. Meanwhile, Abby and McGee head to Mexico and investigate the 20-year-old mystery of a drug dealer's murder. Their actions attract the attention of the head of a local drug cartel, and links begin to emerge between their case, the serial killings and Gibbs's past

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler investigates an assault case involving his former partner's teenage son, who assaulted a female friend during a drug-induced rage. However, the conflict between the detective's work and personal life pushes him to the verge of a breakdown and jeopardises the squad's reputation. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives examine the deaths of two gay men, both of whom were labelled as 'killers' by their murderer. Further investigation reveals the victims had an aggressive strain of HIV, leading the team to consider the possibility that the suspect is a vigilante operating in the interests of an Aids-awareness group. CCH Pounder guest stars, with BD Wong, Dann Florek and Diane Neal

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is accused of murdering two Arab-Americans - but his attorney mounts a novel defence, claiming he was compelled to kill because he is genetically predisposed toward hatred and violence. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.desc: A US Marine, a waitress and a chef are shot dead at a diner, in what is thought to be a bungled robbery. However, when the team arrives to investigate, a previously unknown witness emerges from the eatery's freezer, claiming the killer had an unusual tattoo. The statement rings alarm bells for LaSalle, who realises the circumstances of the killings match those of his first-ever case with Pride 10 years earlier, which remained unsolved after Hurricane Katrina devastated the crime scene. Convinced their killer has struck again, he and Pride work together once again in an attempt to achieve closure once and for all. Naval crime drama, starring Lucas Black and Scott Bakula

programme.desc: Hondo and the team race to save their former unit leader Buck Spivey when he goes off grid and they fear he plans to harm himself. Comedy, starring Norman Wisdom, Ian Hunter, David Lodge and John Le Mesurier

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Cat-catchers Maggie and Jim attempt to round-up a colony of farm cats. However, the task proves harder than they imagined. Harley comes to the hospital for routine check-up, but Claire discovers a murmur. Elsewhere, Martina searches for an effective stress relief for her cat

programme.title: United (2011)
programme.desc: Drama charting the story of the 'Busby Babes' - the Manchester United side who became the youngest-ever winners of the English Football League in 1956. Having won the league again in 1957, the team reaches the quarter-finals of the European Cup in 1958 - but disaster strikes as they return from the match in Belgrade, when their charter plane crashes following a refuelling stop in Munich. The disaster claims the lives of 23 people, including eight players - and with manager Matt Busby in a critical condition, coach Jimmy Murphy tries to rebuild the shattered team. Starring David Tennant, Jack O'Connell, Sam Claflin and Dougray Scott

programme.desc: A man borrows money from a loan shark, but ends up with a price on his head when he cannot pay it back. Comedy thriller, starring Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson and Jim Broadbent

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes and Julie Graham as lonely hearts looking for love. Undertaker William Shawcross joins a dating agency in the hope of finding his ideal match, and is instantly attracted to put-upon midwife Mary Gilcrest - but she is less than keen to go on a date as she has her hands full with a mother-to-be suffering from a terminal illness. After a lacklustre first meeting, Mary agrees to see William again and a spark ignites between the fledgling couple - only for tragedy to strike when her patient dies, and the undertaker is called in to remove the body, revealing his unappealing occupation in the process. With Dominick Baron, Ricci Mcleod, Cheryl Campbell and Michael Begley

programme.title: Dickensian
programme.desc: Compeyson realises Matthew is in love with Amelia and manipulatively tells him that he must continue his travels in America in order to win her love, while Bucket continues his investigation by turning his sights on Mr Barbary, who was seen with Marley on Christmas Eve. Elsewhere, Bill tries to take Nancy away from her work as a prostitute, but fails to meet Fagin's lofty price demands, and Mrs Gamp tells Silas a hair-raising story to persuade him not to live alone. Period drama re-imagining the works of Charles Dickens, starring Stephen Rea, Adrian Rawlins and Joseph Quinn

programme.title: Mistresses
programme.desc: Siobhan's boss introduces her to a new client who, much to her surprise, is the man she shared a secret liaison with two nights before. Trudi grows suspicious of Richard's spending habits, Katie is confused in matters of the heart and newlywed Jessica looks for affection elsewhere.
